headline: JPMorgan Raises Johnson Controls International plc (JCI) Target After Q1 “Break Out in Performance”
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) is included among 12 Unstoppable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 6, JPMorgan raised its price target on Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE:JCI) to $158 from $138 and maintained an Overweight rating on the shares. In a research note, the firm said the company’s fiscal Q1 results […]
